sentences.en: Bad temper is his worst infirmity.
sentences.cn: 坏脾气是他最大的弱点.

sentences.en: Do you have hearing or sight impairment, physical defect or infirmity?
sentences.cn: 您有否听觉或视力障碍 、 身体缺陷或疾病?

sentences.en: Health is a state of complete physical, mental and social well-being and not merely the absence of disease or infirmity.
sentences.cn: 健康是身体的、心理的及社会的达到完全安适状态，而不仅是没有疾病或身体虚弱而已。

sentences.en: His own infirmity was not the result of the English climate.
sentences.cn: 他的虚弱体质不是英国气候造成的.

sentences.en: I have the germs of every human infirmity in me.
sentences.cn: 人类所有的毛病在我身上都有发生的可能.

sentences.en: Infirmity often comes with old age.
Old age and infirmity had begun to catch up with him.
sentences.cn: 他开始显出年老体衰的样子了.

sentences.en: The infirmity that felling is so by oneself with need to be depended on!
sentences.cn: 感觉自己是那么的虚弱和需要依靠!

sentences.en: The old woman was suffering from age and infirmity.
sentences.cn: 那个老妇人受年老体弱之苦.

sentences.en: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?
sentences.cn: 箴18:14人有疾病、心能忍耐. 心灵忧伤、谁能承当 呢 .

sentences.en: The state of being weak or feeble; infirmity.
sentences.cn: 衰弱虚弱或无力的状态; 体弱.

sentences.en: We all fear disability or infirmity.
sentences.cn: 我们都害怕伤残或体弱。

sentences.en: Whoever causes bodily pain, disease or infirmity to any person is said to cause hurt.
sentences.cn: 任何人只要造成他人身体疼痛, 疾病或虚弱,都被称为“伤害”

sentences.en: Workers lose productivity by interrupting a business meeting and disrupt social gatherings because of their infirmity, the report said.
sentences.cn: 报告中说，因为工人们的虚弱，通过中断了业务会议而失去生产效率，并且破坏了社交聚会的范围。

words.tran_cn: 衰弱的；意志薄弱的；不坚固的
